title: Mistakes in Summoner Profile (Item/Champion)
body:
In summoner profile I found that Shaco's E in his ability description still states that it can apply a miss chance to minions and monsters, however in game it's been updated to show that it applies a slow. 

On another note in item sets 'Stalkers Blade - Sated Devourer' shows +0.1% Lifesteal vs monsters not the intended 10%. 

Lastly 'Trackers knife/Upgrade devourer' turns into Poachers knife-Sated Devourer, I'm not sure if this is intended but I presume not.

(I apologize for not having any pictures, this is due to me being unable to get them working) 

Is anyone else finding any mistakes or things needing updates anywhere else?
